summary: This is an email chain between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff regarding the Epstein investigation. It discusses canceling a trip to Palm Beach due to a hurricane, rescheduling for a proffer session with a co-conspirator, and mentions a previous successful meeting with victims.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The investigation is described as 'ongoing investigation of Epstein's co-conspirators,' indicating he is the central figure whose associates are being investigated.

connections.description: O is explicitly referred to as one of 'Epstein's co-conspirators' in the context of an ongoing investigation.

events.title: Meeting with victims
events.description: Prosecutors met with victims, who were described as 'very grateful,' and the meeting was helpful to the ongoing investigation.

events.title: Planned proffer session with O
events.description: Prosecutors planned to travel to Palm Beach to conduct a proffer (a formal interview where a subject offers information) with co-conspirator O. This trip was later canceled due to a hurricane.

events.title: Trip cancellation due to hurricane
events.description: The planned trip to Palm Beach for the proffer session was canceled because of an anticipated hurricane. Rescheduling for later that week or the following week was proposed.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) was actively investigating Epstein's co-conspirators in August 2019, shortly after Epstein's death.
Prosecutors successfully met with victims on August 27, 2019, and found the meeting very helpful for the investigation.
A key investigative step was a planned proffer session with a co-conspirator identified as 'O' in Palm Beach.
The planned travel for the proffer was canceled due to an anticipated hurricane, indicating the investigation's activities were affected by external events.
The correspondence shows standard operational procedures, including requesting permission for travel and booking conference rooms for meetings.
